page.description: Explore individual pricing and services for professional headshots in Loudoun County, VA. Book now for expert coaching and image retouching.

hero.title: Choose Your Perfect Package
hero.subtitle: Your headshot is your digital first impression. In a relaxed, guided session, we'll create images that elevate your brand and feel authentically you.

packages.name: The Express
packages.description: Perfect for busy professionals who need polished headshots quickly.
packages.whatsIncluded: Up to 20-minute in-studio session, two fully-retouched images included (purchase additional photos for $195 each), Add makeup services for $150

packages.name: The Signature
packages.description: Our comprehensive session for professionals who want variety and options.
packages.whatsIncluded: 60-minute studio session, 5 fully retouched digital images, 15-minute pre-session consultation call, 2-3 background and lighting setups, Complete wardrobe and posing guidance, Online gallery delivery within 7 business days, High-resolution files for all platforms, makeup services for $150

packages.name: The Executive
packages.description: The ultimate headshot experience for established professionals who need a complete image library.
packages.whatsIncluded: 90-minute studio session, 10 fully retouched digital images, 30-minute pre-session strategy consultation, Multiple backgrounds, lighting styles, and looks, Complete style and wardrobe consultation, Same-day image preview available, Priority 5-day gallery delivery, 6 months of complimentary minor retouching updates, High-resolution files optimized for every use

steps.title: Book Online
steps.description: Choose your perfect session and schedule your appointment online

steps.title: Prep Guide Arrives
steps.description: Receive detailed preparation tips to look your absolute best

steps.title: Guided Session
steps.description: Relax and enjoy a professional, comfortable photo experience

steps.title: Select Images
steps.description: Review and choose your favorite shots from the session

steps.title: Final Delivery
steps.description: Receive your professionally retouched images in 7-10 business days

reviews.name: E. Zeigler
reviews.text: I had an absolutely amazing experience working with Marquel. She made the entire process feel effortless.

reviews.name: J. Dennis
reviews.text: Marquel is very friendly and professional. She made me feel at ease and took fantastic headshots!

reviews.name: C. Everett
reviews.text: Marquel is the absolute truth! Her professionalism and suggestions on clothing, stance, poses brought out the image that I wanted to portray. I ADORE my new headshots!
